night.text: Cloudy with clear spells. In many places snow, on coastal areas sleet and rain too. Northwest, north wind 4-10, on coasts in gusts up to 15 m/s. Air temperature -2..-8, on coast locally up to +1°C.
night.sea: Forecast for Baltic Sea valid 24 hours from 19:00 Nov 26 to 19:00 UTC Nov 27, 2018. Weather summary: trough of Low moving to southeast. At night eastern part of High reaching Baltic Sea.Warnings: Northern Baltic, Gulf of Finland: northwest in gusts 15 m/s. Wave height 1 to 2 m.Northern Baltic, Gulf of Finland: northwest, north 6 to 11, in gusts 15 m/s. Wave height 1 to 2 m. At times snow or sleet. Visibility moderate to good.Moonsund, Northern Gulf of Riga: northwest, north 4 to 10, in gusts 13 m/s. Sleet or snow in some places. Visibility moderate to good.
night.peipsi: Northwest, north wind 4-8, in gusts 10 m/s. Wave height 0,5-1,2 m. At times snow. Visibility moderate to good. Air temperature -3..-5°C.

day.text: Partly cloudy. Mainly snow locally. Northwest, north wind 4-10, on coasts in gusts up to 15 m/s. Air temperature 0..-4, on coasts up to +2°C.
day.peipsi: Northwest, north wind 4-8, in gusts 10 m/s. Wave height 0,5-1,2 m. At times snow. Visibility moderate or good. Air temperature -1..-3°C.

night.text: Cloudy with clear spells. Some snow locally. Around north wind 2-8, at first on northerncoast in gusts 12 m/s. Air temperature -3..-9, on coast locally up to +1°C.

day.text: Partly cloudy and mainly dry. Mainly around west wind 2-8, in evening on northern coast southwest in gusts 13 m/s. Air temperature is -1..-5, on coast locally +2°C.

night.text: Slightly and partly cloudy and mainly dry. Southwest, south wind increasing 6-12, on coasts in gusts to 17 m/s. Air temperature is -3..-9, on coasts locally up to +2°C.

day.text: Slightly and partly cloudy and mainly dry. Southwest, south wind 7-13, in gusts 15, on islands and coasts up to 21 m/s. Air temperature is 0..-5, on coasts locally up to +2°C.

night.text: Slightly and partly cloudy and dry. Southwest, south wind 7-12, in gusts 15, on islands and coast 10-15, in gusts 21 m/s. Air temperature is -2..-8, on coast locally up to +2°C.

day.text: Slightly and partly cloudy and dry. Southwest, south wind 7-12, in gusts 15, on islands and coast 10-15, in gusts 21 m/s. Air temperature is 0..-4, on coast locally up to +2°C.
